NanoAuCal Calculate Molar Particle Concentration(nM/L) Calculate Diameter of Gold Nano Particles(GNPs) (nm) Supporting Information About this Application Input Error //concentration calculate Please enter the diameter of GNPs: Note: the diameter should be between 2 nm and 100 nm Calculate The molar particle concentration: (nM/L) Please check: 
1. The input diameter should be between 2nm and 100nm. 
 2.The unit of input diameter should be in nm. Please enter the optical density at 450 nm of UV-visible spectrum of GNPs: The mass of GNPs: (mg/ml) The molar concentration of gold per litre: (mM) Calculate Again //diameter calculate Please enter the surface plasma resonance: 
Note: the value should be greater than 512 nm Please enter your data! //small diameter calculation The diameter calculated is less than 35 nm. 
Please enter the the Ratio of the absorbance of GNPs at the surface plasma resonance peak to the absorbance at 450 nm: //about this App This app is designed by Professor Nguyen T. K. Thanh at University College London to help researchers and users to easily calculate concentration and size of gold nano particles simply based on their UV-VS spectrum. //useful links Link to Professor Nguyen T. K. Thanh website Related Papers Supporting information
